name: Æther Mutation
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

name: Ana Disciple
text:
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "The blessings of Gaea alone are no longer enough."

name: Ana Sanctuary
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

name: Anavolver
text:
Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} and/or {B} as you cast this spell.)
If Anavolver was kicked with its {1}{U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.
If Anavolver was kicked with its {B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."

name: Angelfire Crusader
text: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Nothing burns hotter than the fires of holy rage.

name: Battlefield Forge
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

name: Bloodfire Colossus
text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

editions.flavor: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.
It took all its strength to contain the fire within.
It took all its strength to contain the fire within.
It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

name: Bloodfire Dwarf
text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: Bloodfire Dwarf deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

editions.flavor: For them, the only honorable death is one that leaves a crater.

name: Bloodfire Infusion
text:
Enchant creature you control
{R}, Sacrifice enchanted creature: Bloodfire Infusion deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to each creature.

name: Bloodfire Kavu
text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: Bloodfire Kavu deals 2 damage to each creature.

editions.flavor: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.
Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

name: Bog Gnarr
text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Not all of Dominaria's defenders were nourished by the light.

name: Brass Herald
text:
As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

name: Captain's Maneuver
text: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to another target creature or player instead.

editions.flavor: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.
Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.

name: Caves of Koilos
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

name: Ceta Disciple
text:
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: "The sea holds all that you need. You simply must know how to ask for it."

name: Ceta Sanctuary
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.

name: Cetavolver
text:
Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.)
If Cetavolver was kicked with its {1}{R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.
If Cetavolver was kicked with its {G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with trample.

name: Chaos
text: Creatures can't block this turn.

name: Coalition Flag
text:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature is a Flagbearer.
While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

name: Coalition Honor Guard
text: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

editions.flavor: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

name: Coastal Drake
text:
Flying
{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: When the kavu emerged from their ancient nests, food chains long dormant became vibrant again.

name: Consume Strength
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"You are correct. This is going to hurt."
—Vraska
As Multani's troops invaded Urborg, the decay of the swamp became a feast for the living.

name: Cromat
text:
{W}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking or blocked by Cromat.
{U}{R}: Cromat gains flying until end of turn.
{B}{G}: Regenerate Cromat.
{R}{W}: Cromat gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{G}{U}: Put Cromat on top of its owner's library.

name: Day
text: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Dead Ringers
text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."

name: Death
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

editions.artist: Edward P. Beard, Jr. & Anthony S. Waters

name: Death Grasp
text: Death Grasp deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain X life.

editions.flavor: Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart—all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.
Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart—all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.

Yawgmoth's greatest joy came from watching one hero defeat another.

name: Death Mutation
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

name: Dega Disciple
text:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "There is no true equity of power. There is only more and less."

name: Dega Sanctuary
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.

name: Degavolver
text:
Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {R} as you cast this spell.)
If Degavolver was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver."
If Degavolver was kicked with its {R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.

name: Desolation Angel
text:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Desolation Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.

name: Desolation Giant
text:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

name: Diversionary Tactics
text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.

editions.flavor: "It's the oldest trick in the book," said Guff. "And I ought to know—I wrote it."

name: Divine Light
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

editions.flavor:
"Phyrexia is an unforgiving place, and I am an angry lord in an unforgiving mood."
—Lord Windgrace

name: Dodecapod
text: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

name: Dragon Arch
text: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

editions.flavor: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.

name: Dwarven Landslide
text:
Kicker—{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land. (You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target land. If Dwarven Landslide was kicked, destroy another target land.

name: Dwarven Patrol
text:
Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you cast a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.

editions.flavor: Dwarves never worry about who watches their backs.

name: Ebony Treefolk
text: {B}{G}: Ebony Treefolk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Its roots are equally happy to drink the water of a clear stream or the oily blood of a Phyrexian warrior.

name: Emblazoned Golem
text:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If Emblazoned Golem was kicked, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Enlistment Officer
text:
First strike
When Enlistment Officer enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Evasive Action
text: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition
editions.flavor: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.
Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

name: False Dawn
text:
Until end of turn, spells and abilities you control that would add colored mana to your mana pool add that much white mana instead. Until end of turn, you may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color.
Draw a card.

name: Fervent Charge
text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Crovax was nearly buried beneath the weight of his opponents.

name: Fire
text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

name: Flowstone Charger
text: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: A mane of flowstone and a mien of fury.

name: Foul Presence
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."

editions.flavor: The Phyrexians have one word that means both "evolution" and "pain."

name: Fungal Shambler
text:
Trample
Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.

name: Gaea's Balance
text:
As an additional cost to cast Gaea's Balance, sacrifice five lands.
Search your library for a land card of each basic land type and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Gaea's Skyfolk
text: Flying

editions.flavor: The grace of the forest and the spirit of the sea.

name: Gerrard Capashen
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

name: Gerrard's Verdict
text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.

editions.flavor: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.
A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

name: Glade Gnarr
text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.

name: Goblin Legionnaire
text:
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

name: Goblin Ringleader
text:
Haste
When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Goblin Trenches
text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

editions.flavor: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.
The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.

name: Grave Defiler
text:
When Grave Defiler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Zombie cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grave Defiler.

name: Guided Passage
text: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Haunted Angel
text:
Flying
When Haunted Angel dies, exile Haunted Angel and each other player puts a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Helionaut
text:
Flying
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Hope kept the defenders aloft, but only courage kept them in the fight.

name: Ice
text:
Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.

name: Ice Cave
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)

editions.flavor: Even the oppresive cold of the cave could not temper Eladamri's ire.

name: Illuminate
text:
Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If Illuminate was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, it deals X damage to that creature's controller. If Illuminate was kicked with its {3}{U} kicker, you draw X cards.

name: Illusion
text: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Index
text: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

editions.flavor: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."
"What good is having all the right answers if you have them at all the wrong times?"
"Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

text: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.

—Sisay

name: Jilt
text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)

text:

text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.

editions.flavor: The duty: to defend. The reason: to survive.

name: Shimmering Mirage
text:
Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"Oh, is that all you need? Why didn't you just say so?"
—Reef shaman

name: Shivan Reef
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

name: Smash
text:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"They're ugly, and they're in my way."
—Tahngarth
Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.
Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

name: Soul Link
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.

editions.flavor: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.

name: Spectral Lynx
text:
Protection from green
{B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.

editions.flavor: A shadowy version of its corporeal cousin, this lynx hunts souls, not meals.

name: Spiritmonger
text:
Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.
{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.
{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Squee's Embrace
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Squee's Revenge
text: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.

name: Standard Bearer
text: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

editions.flavor: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.

name: Strength of Night
text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If Strength of Night was kicked, Zombie creatures you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Suffocating Blast
text: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.

name: Suppress
text: Target player exiles all cards from his or her hand face down. At the beginning of the end step of that player's next turn, that player returns those cards to his or her hand.

name: Sylvan Messenger
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins

name: Symbiotic Deployment
text:
Skip your draw step.
{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat."
—Eladamri

name: Tahngarth's Glare
text: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.

name: Temporal Spring
text: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

editions.flavor: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.

name: Tidal Courier
text:
When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

name: Tranquil Path
text:
Destroy all enchantments.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.

name: Tundra Kavu
text: {T}: Target land becomes a Plains or an Island until end of turn.

editions.flavor: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.

name: Unnatural Selection
text: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.

editions.flavor: What nature makes, magic can modify.

name: Urborg Elf
text: {T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: The elves of Urborg are as deadly and capricious as the swamp itself.

name: Urborg Uprising
text:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.
In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

name: Vindicate
text: Destroy target permanent.

editions.flavor:
"Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny."
—Gerrard
Some convictions are so strong that the world must break to accommodate them.

"I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me."
—Sorin Markov

name: Vodalian Mystic
text: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.

editions.flavor:
"Sometimes when I look at the ocean, I could swear it changes colors."
—Sisay

name: Whirlpool Drake
text:
Flying
When Whirlpool Drake enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
When Whirlpool Drake dies, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

name: Whirlpool Rider
text: When Whirlpool Rider enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

editions.flavor: Where the wind meets the water, change is inevitable.

name: Whirlpool Warrior
text:
When Whirlpool Warrior enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
{R}, Sacrifice Whirlpool Warrior: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

name: Wild Research
text:
{1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.
{1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.

name: Yavimaya Coast
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

name: Yavimaya's Embrace
text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

name: Zombie Boa
text: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

editions.flavor: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.
